actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-483.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 1885, to amend Civil Service retirement provisions as they apply to certain employees of the Bureau of Indian Affairs and of the Indian Health Service who are not entitled to Indian employment preference and to modify the application of the Indian employment preference laws as it applies to those agencies.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 1885 (Bureau of Indian Affairs and Indian Health Service Civil Service retirement).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 1885, to amend Civil Service retirement provisions as they apply to certain employees of the Bureau of Indian Affairs and of the Indian Health Service who are not entitled to Indian employment preference and to modify the application of the Indian employment preference laws as it applies to those agencies.
